languages.text: "Мне показалось, мы оба с самого начала понимали, о чем речь, шерин. Примите мои искренние извинения, если это не так. И позвольте объясниться".
"I thought we were on the same page from the start, shereen. Please accept my sincerest apologies if that is not the case, and allow me to explain myself."
languages.original_text: "Мне показалось, мы оба с самого начала понимали, о чем речь, шерин. Примите мои искренние извинения, если это не так. И позвольте объясниться".

traits.locale_text: "I thought we were on the same page from the start, shereen. Please accept my sincere apologies if that is not the case, and allow me to explain myself."
"I thought we were on the same page from the start, shereen. Please accept my sincere apologies if that is not the case, and allow me to explain myself."
"I thought we were on the same page from the start, shereen. Please accept my sincere apologies if that is not the case, and allow me to explain myself."
"I thought we were on the same page from the start, shereen. Please accept my sincere apologies if that is not the case, and allow me to explain myself."

languages.text: “我还以为我们从一开始就想到一起去了，亲爱的。如果事实并非如此，请接受我诚挚的歉意，并允许我稍微解释一下。”
languages.original_text: "I thought we were on the same page from the start, shereen. Please accept my sincerest apologies if that is not the case, and allow me to explain myself."

traits.locale_text: “我还以为我们从一开始就想到一起去了，亲爱的。如果事实并非如此，请接受我诚挚的歉意，并允许我稍微解释一下。”

languages.text: «Creía que nos habíamos entendido desde el primer momento, shereen. Si no es así, permita que me disculpe sinceramente y le explique mi posición».
languages.original_text: "I thought we were on the same page from the start, shereen. Please accept my sincerest apologies if that is not the case, and allow me to explain myself."

traits.locale_text: «Creía que nos habíamos entendido desde el primer momento, shereen. Si no es así, permita que me disculpe sinceramente y le explique mi posición».

languages.text: 「あたしたち、最初から同じ考えだったと思っていたよ、シャリーン。そうじゃなかったら謝るよ。それから、詳しく説明させてほしいな」
languages.original_text: "I thought we were on the same page from the start, shereen. Please accept my sincerest apologies if that is not the case, and allow me to explain myself."

traits.locale_text: 「あたしたち、最初から同じ考えだったと思っていたよ、シャリーン。そうじゃなかったら謝るよ。それから、詳しく説明させてほしいな」

languages.text: « Je croyais que nous étions sur la même longueur d'onde, shereen. Si ce n'est pas le cas, permettez-moi de vous présenter mes plus plates excuses et de m'expliquer. »
languages.original_text: "I thought we were on the same page from the start, shereen. Please accept my sincerest apologies if that is not the case, and allow me to explain myself."

traits.locale_text: « Je croyais que nous étions sur la même longueur d'onde, shereen. Si ce n'est pas le cas, permettez-moi de vous présenter mes plus plates excuses et de m'expliquer. »

languages.text: "Ich glaubte, dass wir von Anfang an mit offenen Karten gespielt haben, Shereen. Bitte akzeptiert meine aufrichtige Entschuldigung, wenn dem nicht so ist, und gestattet mir, mich zu erklären."
languages.original_text: "I thought we were on the same page from the start, shereen. Please accept my sincerest apologies if that is not the case, and allow me to explain myself."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaubte, dass wir von Anfang an mit offenen Karten gespielt haben, Shereen. Bitte akzeptiert meine aufrichtige Entschuldigung, wenn dem nicht so ist, und gestattet mir, mich zu erklären."
"Ich glaubte, dass wir von Anfang an mit offenen Karten gespielt haben, Shereen. Bitte akzeptiert meine aufrichtige Entschuldigung, wenn dem nicht so ist, und gestattet mir, mich zu erklären."

languages.original_text: "I thought we were on the same page from the start, shereen. Please accept my sincere apologies if that is not the case, and allow me to explain myself."

languages.text: "En başından hemfikir olduğumuzu sanıyordum şirinim. Madem öyle değilmiş, o hâlde içtenlikle özür dilerim. Müsaadenle durumu açıklayayım."
languages.original_text: "I thought we were on the same page from the start, shereen. Please accept my sincerest apologies if that is not the case, and allow me to explain myself."

traits.locale_text: "Konuşmaya başladığımızda ikimiz de aslında olan biteni biliyoruz sanmıştım şirinim. Madem öyle değilmiş, o hâlde içtenlikle özür dilerim; müsaadenle durumu açıklayayım."
